Robin

m<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 27, 2008 10:=
28 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Frank's box on TV last night



  Okay, =
lets all get out there and start slapping demon hunters.  She may have star=
ted something new.......:)

  Jeff

  In a message dated 2/27/2008 12:19:40=
 P.M. Central Standard Time, bulletbabea@...<mailto:bulletbabea@yahoo=
.com> writes:

    LOL I wasnt gonna touch that one but yeah me too heheheh=
e i was like "did she just???...rewindddddddd...she did!!!

    As for the =
demon thing.... nope not even with a 10 foot pole.

    Misty

    Frank Ra=
tka <warrior18eii@...> wrote:
      Because by contract PSR has to us=
e the word demon on each episode (J/J). The name alone gets people interest=
ed, scared and so on. LOL Oh, I love Lorainne Warren's method of removing C=
hip from a trance. She slapped the shit out of him. he he hehe I almost fel=
l over! You could hear the sarcastic "thank you" from Chip. LMFAO

      Re=
gards,

      Frank R.


      ----- Original Message ----
      From: LC D=
uplatt <lcdupla@...>
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: We=
dnesday, February 27, 2008 10:13:24 AM
      Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Frank's=
 box on TV last night


      Yes, the old "demon chasing" crap, once again=
. 

      I brought the following thought up elsewhere and will bring it up=
 
      here for consideration, too. If ghosts are coming through the box 
=
      and thus are not in a good state of mind, how come on Paranormal 
   =
   State CM was willing to believe the message given by the ghost via 
    =
  the box as being truth (The ghost via the box said a "demon" was 
      h=
olding the ghosts captive there)? 

      I would suggest that perhaps a gh=
ost (assuming we are talking about a 
      disembodied person who remains =
earthbound) is not in a healthy state 
      of mind one would consider "st=
able," but trapped in emotional trauma 
      of some sort. Thus, how relia=
ble could the message of a ghost then 
      be? ;)

      LC

      --- In=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, "wgungfu" <wgu=
ngfu3@.. .> wrote:
      >
      > Don't know if anyone caught it, but Fran=
k's box was used on last
      > night's episode of Paranormal State on A&E=
. They were investigating
      > an old insane asylum, and they had Chris =
Moon as a guest 
      investigator
      > with the box. You can see the p=
romo clip here:
      > 
      > http://www.pennstat eprs.com/ ps_asylum. m=
ov<http://www.pennstateprs.com/ps_asylum.mov>
      > 
      > Here's the s=
ite for the show itself:
      > 
      > http://www.aetv. com/paranormal- =
state/index. jsp<http://www.aetv.com/paranormal-state/index.jsp>
      > 
 =
     > For those not familiar, its a half hour show that follows along the
=
      > "Penn State Paranormal Research Society" and different cases they 
=
      take
      > on. Their niche in the "paranormal reality tv show" mark=
et is that
      > the group's leader follows a more Christian orientated s=
kew on
      > happenings. Lots of "demons" (they have Lorraine Warren gues=
t all 
      the
      > time), and they usually try to do investigations/ =
communication only
      > during what they call "dead time", 3am-4am, or "=
the polar opposite 
      of
      > 3pm - the time Jesus gave is life for =
all mankind" as they put it. 
      Oh,
      > and they have an "occult sp=
ecialist" on the team that so far has 
      been
      > anything but.
   =
   > 
      > On the positive side, they did actually get (and record for l=
ater
      > analysis) live communication on the box in response to questio=
ns 
      being
      > asked. And on the analysis and isolation of the rec=
orded parts, you
      > could actually hear what was being said (as oppose=
d to the usual of
      > Chris acting as a go-between for very distorted s=
ounds like on those
      > youtube videos). So it was good to see it a)wor=
king in the "field"
      > and b)get some exposure on a tv show.
      > 
=
      > 
      > Marty
